description: APPLICATION FOR A LAWFUL DEVELOPMENT CERTIFICATE IN RESPECT OF A HIP TO GABLE ROOF EXTENSION AND REAR FACING DORMER WINDOW
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The operations, erection of a hip to gable roof extension and rear facing dormer window, would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class B of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class B. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 2 - The operations, insertion of rooflights, would consist of any other alteration to the roof of the dwelling house within the meaning of Class C of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class C. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 3 - INFORMATIVE
The materials to be used in the external finish of the development hereby approved must have a similar appearance to the external material of the existing dwellinghouse in order to comply with  Class B of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order".
